title: Metadata Category Schema
description: Standardized enumeration of categories for organizing metadata in The Shadow Team Chronicles universe.

descriptions.description: Detailed explanations of each metadata category (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

authorship.description: Information about who created or contributed to the content.

narrative_structure.description: Details about storytelling approach, perspective, tense, and style.

technical_attributes.description: File formats, sizes, word counts, and other metrics.

publication_details.description: When and how content was or will be released or presented.

version_control.description: Change history, versioning, and branch information.

workflow_status.description: Where content stands in production pipeline and who is assigned to it.

classification.description: Categories, tags, genres, and other organizational labels.

ai_generation.description: Parameters, models, and techniques used in AI-assisted content.

references.description: Links to other content, external sources, or research materials.

analytics.description: Performance metrics, user engagement, and other measurement data.

localization.description: Translation status, regional variants, and cultural adaptation information.

permissions.description: Access controls, copyright, and usage rights.

chronology.description: Timeline positioning and temporal relationships within the narrative universe.

multiverse_position.description: Where content fits within parallel universes or alternate reality structures.
